name: Auto Sale Life: Fresh Start
description:
Note: This is a free prologue version.

In this unique simulation game, grow your business by starting with the auto trade and make a profit by selling it. But your business isn't just limited to the car trade; At the same time, you can buy and manage car washes, parking lots, and many other businesses. Auto Sale Life.



This game is not only about trading and business management, but also about a journey of storytelling. Starting from a simple car buying and selling business in the beginning, you will face various obstacles as you grow your business. But remember, every obstacle creates a new opportunity.

BUILD A LARGE TRADING NETWORK

  • Get your first car dealership and start car trading on the open world map where you can access each region. Get help from the map to explore car markets and set out to buy your first car. You can either walk or take the bus. You can even take a taxi to the car market if you want.
  • Interact with many dealers in the car market. Choose the car that best fits your budget and deal with the owner. Win the deal and own the car. Get in the car and make your way to your gallery.
  • You can buy your car as you bought it or sell it by improving it. Take your purchased car to auto repair. Calculate your expenses and get the opportunity to increase the value of the car.



IMPROVE YOUR OFFICE


  • Buy a large office. Or grow slowly.
  • Organize your office interior and look for ways to get more customers.
  • Remember that every office has special clients and be prepared to pay for your office.

OPEN PARKING AREAS AND RECRUIT NEW STAFF


  • Improving your office is entirely in your hands. If you wish, you can improve the outside of your office as well as your office.
  • Use the garden of your car dealership as a parking area to earn an additional income. Let cars use your parking space and increase your income.
  • Hire an employee who can handle all the office work while you're away and explore the open world map to the fullest.

ENJOY CARS




  • Discover and buy all the cars featured in Deal & Wheeler. Use them yourself or sell them to others.
  • Remember that every car has a specific price and constantly monitor the market.
  • If you stopped selling the car you bought, travel the open world with it. Break the speed limit and add some excitement to your life.
  • Discover cars with different driving models and reach the peak of excitement.
  • Listen your excitement to the top by hearing different engine sounds.

EXPLORE THE OPEN WORLD

  • Be prepared to encounter an extensive open world of vast and grand scales.
  • Take a tour with your car, exploring different streets.
  • Show your car to people on the streets and let them know that you are starting to build a great empire.
  • Listen to the problems of people on the streets and find solutions to them and earn extra income.

SHAPE YOUR LIFE

  • Whether you buy a small house or a big house. Decide what kind of house you want to live in and take action.
  • Shape the interior of your home and change its appearance.
  • Improve your quality of life by gradually unlocking new homes.

ENJOY THE QUALITY


  • Build a great empire and overcome all the obstacles you may encounter on your way. Tackle challenges and enjoy quality.
  • Recognize quality and increase your self-esteem. Get new customers and build a nice audience.
  • Do not give up on your dreams and fight on this road you have started. Remember, a quality life is only in your hands.
